mapper.select: SELECT CEIL(A1.TOT_CNT / #{gridRow}) AS TOT_PAGE , #{gridPage} AS GRID_PAGE , #{gridRow} AS GRID_ROW , TOT_CNT , LOGIN_ID , USER_NM , EMP_NO , ADDR , FRONT_REG_NO , GENDER , EMAIL , TEL_NUM , EMER_TEL_NUM , ENTR_DT , RESING_DT , DEPT_CD , GRADE_CD , LVL_EDU , MAJOR , MARR_YN , SAL_CLAS , FST_REG_DTTM , FST_RGST_EMP_NO , LST_CHG_DTTM , LST_CHG_EMP_NO FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , COUNT(1) OVER() AS TOT_CNT , LOGIN_ID , USER_NM , EMP_NO , ADDR , FRONT_REG_NO , GENDER , EMAIL , TEL_NUM , EMER_TEL_NUM , ENTR_DT , RESING_DT , DEPT_CD , GRADE_CD , LVL_EDU , MAJOR , MARR_YN , SAL_CLAS , FST_REG_DTTM , FST_RGST_EMP_NO , LST_CHG_DTTM , LST_CHG_EMP_NO FROM TB_I1000 WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY EMP_NO ) A1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND A1.RN BETWEEN #{gridPage} * #{gridRow} + 1 and #{gridPage} * #{gridRow} + #{gridRow} + 1
